chart_description: The Netdata Query Pages Metadata Source chart displays the rate at which the Netdata database engine retrieves metadata about pages from various sources.

dimension_descriptions.cache hit: The rate at which metadata is retrieved from the cache.
dimension_descriptions.journal v2 scan: The rate at which metadata is retrieved by scanning the journal version 2.
dimension_descriptions.open journal: The rate at which metadata is retrieved from an open journal.
